QuestData.Title: Return to the Grove
QuestData.Description: Forgive me, $r. Archdruid Moonclaw's fall is a terrible blow...$b$bMalfurion must be informed of what has transpired here. Inform him of Thaon's fate and of the return of Xavius.$b$bMake haste, friend. I fear this may be the greatest threat Val'sharah has ever faced.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Malfurion Stormrage at the Grove of Cenarius in Val'sharah.
QuestData.RewardText: Thaon will be dearly missed. We may not have always seen eye to eye, but he was a great druid and a true protector of the vale.$b$bXavius will pay for his death...
